column4: after my netbook with 10.04 on it ran out of battery power and shut down, NetworkManager has refused to find any kind of network connections and just says that network is not accessible. Any ideas on how to locate and/or solve the problem?
you sure you didn't accidentally flip that switch placed maybe on the bottom side of your laptop that turns wifi off?
afaik there isn't a mechanical switch for that
oh, ok. Dunno how common that switch is
